mapper.insert: insert into user (username, password, sex, phone, email, birthday, nickname, createdate) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{sex}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{birthday}, #{nickname}, #{createdate})
mapper.update: update user set username = #{username}, password = #{password}, sex = #{sex}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, birthday = #{birthday}, nickname = #{nickname}, createdate = #{createdate} where id = #{id}
